barista_record.MSG_TEXT: This Batch number doesn't exist. Enter an existing Batch number, or leave blank to assign a new one if permitted by this process.[$0a$]

Create Purchase Requisitions?[$0a$]
Would you like to create a Purchase Order Receipt from this Purchase Order?[$0a$]
Would you like to create a Purchase Order from this Requisition?[$0a$]
Detail lines exist for this PO. Cannot change the dropship status.[$0a$]
Cannot use the same Sales Order Line reference number on more than one Purchase Order line.[$0a$]

An Invoice Entry exists for this Purchase Order. It cannot be modified.[$0a$]
This invoice has not been fully distributed. Correct the invoice detail or make a GL entry. [$0a$]You can run the register, but will not be allowed to update until this imbalance is corrected.[$0a$]
The line code used here must be line type "other."[$0a$]

There were %1 Purchase Order lines with Lot/Serial Number Differences.[$0a$]These differences must be corrected before the update can continue.[$0a$]Lot/Serial Number Differences are listed on the Purchase Order Receipt Register.[$0a$]

Note: This Purchase Order contains items which require entry of Lot/Serial numbers.[$0a$]
Purchase Orders must be installed to run this function.[$0a$]

You have lotted/serialized %2, which is unequal to the quantity received (%1). The register will not update until this imbalance is corrected.[$0a$]
